Posts.Content: I am struggling to get my daughter to take Tamoxifin, she has had them since November last year and because of the hot flushes has actually stopped taking them, who/how do I take this information forward, its really difficult to handle especially with the mood swings and the fact she will be starting her Radiotheraphy in the next couple of weeks. Â  Any suggestions please, are there different doses of the drug?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifin
